articles.title: Truck spends three days dangling over China cliff
articles.description: The driver is said to have tried to reverse on a narrow mountain road.
articles.content:
Two people escaped from a truck which was left dangling over a cliff edge in China for three days. 
It was eventually hauled to safety three days later.
